script.source: if (doc.containsKey('answer.geo.asn') && doc['answer.geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('answer.geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['answer.geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['answer.geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['answer.geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('backend.geo.asn') && doc['backend.geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('backend.geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['backend.geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['backend.geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['backend.geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('client.geo.asn') && doc['client.geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('client.geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['client.geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['client.geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['client.geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('destination.geo.asn') && doc['destination.geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('destination.geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['destination.geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['destination.geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['destination.geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('dhcp.geo.asn') && doc['dhcp.geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('dhcp.geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['dhcp.geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['dhcp.geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['dhcp.geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('original_source.geo.asn') && doc['original_source.geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('original_source.geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['original_source.geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['original_source.geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['original_source.geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('remote.geo.asn') && doc['remote.geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('remote.geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['remote.geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['remote.geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['remote.geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('source.geo.asn') && doc['source.geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('source.geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['source.geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['source.geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['source.geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('xff.geo.asn') && doc['xff.geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('xff.geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['xff.geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['xff.geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['xff.geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }
